Package messaging

Class Summary
ChatMessage A simple class for chat-messages
Message All data which is passed between the clients and the server has to be derived from this class
QuizAnswer A simple class for an answer to a quiz-question
QuizQuestion A simple class for QuizQuestions
SystemMessage A simple class for SystemMessages from the server
